method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the XMLInstruction.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new XML processing instruction.

parameter.name: target
parameter.shortdesc: A name that identifies the processing instruction to an application reading the exported XML file.

parameter.name: data
parameter.shortdesc: A value that tells the application what to do with the processing instruction identified in the target. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: storyOffset
parameter.shortdesc: The location within the story, specified as an insertion point. Can accept: InsertionPoint or Long Integer. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLInstruction &#40;Optional)

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLInstruction with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLInstruction with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLInstructions within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The XMLInstruction, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLInstruction, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The XMLInstruction, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLInstruction, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first XMLInstruction in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last XMLInstruction in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle XMLInstruction in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLInstruction with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the XMLInstruction that follows the desired XMLInstruction.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLInstruction whose index follows the specified XMLInstruction in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The XMLInstruction whose index comes before the desired XMLInstruction.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any XMLInstruction in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every XMLInstruction in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLInstruction.
Returns the XMLInstruction with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
